item.title: Mike add a quote by Harper Lee
item.description: "They're certainly entitled to think that, and they're entitled to full respect for their opinions... but before I can live with other folks I've got to live with myself. The one thing that doesn't abide by majority rule is a person's conscience." -- Harper Lee

item.title: Mike add a quote by Nick Hornby
item.description: "It's no good pretending that any relationship has a future if your record collections disagree violently or if your favorite films wouldn't even speak to each other if they met at a party." -- Nick Hornby

item.title: Mike add a quote by Neal Stephenson
item.description: "The difference between stupid and intelligent people – and this is true whether or not they are well-educated – is that intelligent people can handle subtlety. " -- Neal Stephenson
